If you want a nuke mod, there is a really good one out there, so this mod is no longer supported ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")

Hello fellow KSP players.

Today is a great day for Kerbal Kind, for we have finally discovered the secrets of the atomic bomb!

Hi, this is my first mod. What it seeks to do is add in nuclear weapons (just generic ones for now). The backstory behind this mod is quite simple. BahamutoD refused to make nukes in his BD Armory mod, so I took matters into my own hands and made them myself.

Parts in this mod

A nuclear warhead that just gets plopped on a missile.

An inline nuclear warhead that looks like an Oscar-B. You can put multiple of these together with some regular warheads to make a custom bomb.

A nuclear tipped cruise missile that is launched from the surface.

A nuclear tipped cruise missile that is launched from a plane.

There are also free-fall bombs with and without airbrakes, and a guided bomb!

> 
> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/wxdc8)

Download here from Kerbalstuff: [https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/990/MrScienceMeister%27s%20Nuclear%20Warfare](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/990/MrScienceMeister%27s%20Nuclear%20Warfare)

Textures for this mod were kindly made by JaffaFediration

**Planned features**

Whatever you guys suggest!

**Coming Soon!**

New models and textures!

MIRV Warheads!

This mod has more downloads than there are people living in:

Russia, Ohio, USA,

The entire country of Vatican City

Hanilton, Bernuda

Lots of other places

This mod is a BD armory dependancy. Find it here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-BahamutoD-s-Armory-v0-4-0-Dev-Thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-BahamutoD-s-Armory-v0-4-0-Dev-Thread)

Also, check out my website at mrsciencemeister.weebly.com and YouTube channel(Mr ScienceMeister)

\*Note\*

KerbAtomics not responsible for mass carnage. Use at own risk.

- If I drop a nuke onto the middle of the space center, will it destroy every building there? Similarly, if I fire this at a surface base, how far will the explosive damage go?

- Do nukes leave a permanent crater in the landscape?

- Do nukes leave a short-lived mushroom cloud?

- Do nukes get rid of all nearby ground scatter?
